## ISearchStart.getSearchStrategy property

Get other registered search strategies. For example, if a new strategy needs to use the already-registered OPENSEARCH search strategy, it can use this function to accomplish that.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSearchStrategy: (name: string) => ISearchStrategy<SearchStrategyRequest, SearchStrategyResponse>;
```
